question: Can a haiza write the Quran without touching the page?
answer:
QUESTION

Can a haiza write ayaat of the Quran without touching the page, e.g while putting another page in between?

ANSWER


Share:

 

In the Name of Allah, the Most Gracious, the Most Merciful. 

As-salāmu ‘alaykum wa-rahmatullāhi wa-barakātuh.

It is permissible for a haiza (a woman in the state of menstruation) to write verses of Holy Quran without touching the page; as long as her hand is not directly touching the paper. Based on this, it will be permissible to write verses of the Holy Quran after placing a sheet of paper between ones hand and the page on which the Quranic verses will be written. [i] [ii] [iii] 

And Allah Ta’āla Knows Best

 

Checked and Approved by,
Mufti Ebrahim Desai.

[i] قَالَ فِي مُنْيَةِ الْمُصَلِّي لَا يَجُوزُ وَفِي الْخُجَنْدِيِّ يُكْرَهُ لِلْجُنُبِ وَالْحَائِضِ كِتَابَةُ الْقُرْآنِ إذَا كَانَ مُبَاشِرَ اللَّوْحِ وَالْبَيَاضِ وَإِنْ وَضَعَهُمَا عَلَى الْأَرْضِ وَكَتَبَهُ مِنْ غَيْرِ أَنْ يَضَعَ يَدَهُ عَلَى الْمَكْتُوبِ لَا بَأْسَ بِهِ

)الجوهرة النيرة, ص.٣١, المطبعة الخيرية  (

)شرح فتح القدير, ج.١, ص.١٦٩, دار الفكر(
